sense.name: get or find back; recover
sense.examples: He retrieved the spear gun from the garage and loaded it with a new spear. The rescuer retrieved the distressed sailor and the swimmer simultaneously. Afterward, Bishop testified that he retrieved the sign from the river The Discipline Inspection Department retrieved an economic loss of 3.5 million Yuan. Insert the date your retrieved the information in field 3.

sense.name: COMPUTERS: to locate data from storage, for display on a monitor
sense.examples: This parameter specifies whether IP Reputation Service updates are retrieved. The Gold Standard Search retrieved the same 110 citations, plus many other citations. Can you retrieve names from a BCC field?
